frozen.name: muse-sequencer
frozen.shortDescription: MIDI/Audio sequencer with recording and editing capabilities
frozen.longDescription:
MusE is a MIDI/Audio sequencer with recording and editing capabilities
written originally by Werner Schweer now developed and maintained
by the MusE development team.

MusE aims to be a complete multitrack virtual studio for Linux,
it is published under the GNU General Public License.

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only
